locations.title: Drawing Room Key
locations.description: Given by Tanith upon joining Volcano Manor, or in her chair after defeating Rykard

locations.title: Dagger Talisman
locations.description: From an Imp Statue barrier in the building with the Sending Gate to Audience Pathway, enter the dark room with hanging cages, drop off immediately to the right, and enter through a narrow crevice

locations.title: Crimson Amber Medallion +1
locations.description: Sealed by an Imp Statue all the way down the path from Prison Town Church
